Sentencas: YSZ/Ni is the conventionally most used material for making the anode of a solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Formation of nanostructured YSZ/Ni anode with pore channels by plasma spraying

Sentencas: Agglomerated nanostructured YSZ/NiO powders and plasma spray are applied to produce nanostructured YSZ/NiO coatings on porous support substrates.
Titulo: Formation of nanostructured YSZ/Ni anode with pore channels by plasma spraying

Sentencas: After reduction in an ambient atmosphere of 7% hydrogen and 93% argon at about 800 degrees C for 4 hours, a novel SOFC anode with nanostructured characteristics such as nano YSZ particles, nano Ni particles, nano pores and nano pore channels is produced.
Titulo: Formation of nanostructured YSZ/Ni anode with pore channels by plasma spraying

Sentencas: This new YSZ/Ni anode provides larger triple phase boundaries for hydrogen oxidation reactions.
Titulo: Formation of nanostructured YSZ/Ni anode with pore channels by plasma spraying

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction patterns of these YSZ/NiO coatings after I h of heat treatment at temperatures from 700 to 1100 degrees C are obtained and Scherrer analysis is conducted to study the effect of temperature on grain size.
Titulo: Formation of nanostructured YSZ/Ni anode with pore channels by plasma spraying

Sentencas: The results obtained from SEM, TEM, XRD and EDX measurements and analyses are presented in this investigation.
Titulo: Formation of nanostructured YSZ/Ni anode with pore channels by plasma spraying
